author: Special Correspondent
text:
“After four years, we are proud to announce that all our promises stand fulfilled ( Trinamool mane char bochorei purna sokol protisruti )” are lines from a poem with which the manifesto of Trinamool Congress for the 2016 Assembly election begins.

Releasing the manifesto here on Friday, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee said that she had fulfilled all the promises made to the people and the process of development would gather further momentum in the years to come.
title: ‘All promises fulfilled’
